channel.title: CVE Feed for Code Tides -- Advanced Floating Content
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Code Tides -- Advanced Floating Content

item.title: CVE-2024-32723|2024-04-24T10:06:46.135Z -- Code Tides -- Advanced Floating Content
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Code Tides Advanced Floating Content allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Advanced Floating Content: from n/a through 1.2.5.
